post.body: I hope not :( Going to bed, hoping this is all a bad dream and when I wake up in the morning it will be fixed
This new "most popular" thing could be the death to all of us.
I don't even know, that word is much too big for my brain lol. How do you feel about the time tabs right on top of the icons?
Happy B-day, Mr. SXE
OMG I am so sorry, Marina. At least he is in the right place with doctors. He'll be in my prayers again tonight.
Thank you!
Yes, I did on my other account. I upload the same video twice and got completely different thumbnails
Ooh you didn't tell me you had an audition today! Good luck!
Yeah, check out this video: http://tinyurl.com/5cjovs
Did you know YouTube now supports High Def? If you upload 730p, it should give a High Def option link
Yeah, they just posted a blog about it: http://www.youtube.com/blog
Yeah I must have the non-deluxe version. Sure, I'm up for singing about Twitter :-)
Phonography.. that's on the new album? I have it and it's not on mine lol
I'm so there!
If I lived in the area, I would totally go! Please post footage, I want to see!!
YAY! You took my suggestion :-) You'll enjoy both movies
Yes, Francis Ford Coppola's rendition of Dracula was good: http://tinyurl.com/dracula2
I am! :-)
YES! I'm singing Halleluiah over here! lol
I think I know what you are talking about..
Turn that frown upside down! :)
I second that one :-P
Omg I LOVE it!!! We could be sisters! :-)
I was informed that one of my OPs kicked you from the room accidentally. Sorry I missed you :(
Ooo can't wait to see! Congrats on your new house! :)
Thanks so much for the image map generator link, this makes it sooo much easier.I've been going nuts trying to figure it out.
I don't know who lol. If it happens, I'll know tomorrow and you bet I'll be tweeting it! ;-)
Thanks!
ooh that looks great! You figured out the image map code thing?
Screw them, they're just jealous of your awsomeness! :)
Can you come over and clean my house too? ;)
It took about 10 minutes. Try pushing down the shift key and hit refresh.
Happy birthday, beautiful lady! :-)
Thanks, Chris. I have a feeling about that too :-) Maybe I'll just go the movie parody route from now on.
I don't know, but that is very frustrating. It seems like they are only picking on a few of us ARGH
I know, but YouTube will not allow me to do them unless I have written consent from the publishers. I have to go by their rules
Yes, go watch!!!
Ooh thank you! You are a wealth of information, tay! :-)
Um Josh what is wrong with you!!? Fame is legendary! "I'm gonna live forever... I'm gonna learn how to fly!"
how did he go about doing it? Did he write letters to the publishers? Did he have to pay royalties? Sorry so many questions.
YouTube made it very clear to me that I can't do that. I am not about to compromise my account.
The publisher info I got is from ASCAP. Am I doing the right thing? You know alot more about this stuff than me :-)
Thank you! Yes, I searched and it seems that all of the songs I need are not on there. Also, I believe that doesn't cover video.
Sounds exciting, please keep us posted! :-)
I just have to say, that I adore your xmas icon. You should seriously send it to Hallmark, maybe they'll make a card out of it :)
No Twilight until after the holidays, sorry. I need to re-shoot everything & I just don't have the time right now.
no not yet, this is for something else
Good night all. Don't worry too much about how funky YouTube is right now. It's all just a bad dream.. nighty night
AHHH Our usernames are no longer listed with us on the most subbed page. It only shows our little title thingy!
What is the difference between most viewed and "most popular?"
Is it normal for Tylenol PMs to make you feel drunk?
http://twitpic.com/pwzh - Shopping
http://twitpic.com/pwy0 - Just bought a house...
Thanks for the fun Circus chat! See you all tomorrow night!
Circus-Themed chat tonight http://www.vponblogtv.com
Heading out to support Britney and buy Circus!
Going back to my old workout regime. No more slacking, I want my six pack back.
Going to bed, thanks to all who steered me away from entering the light side today!!
Snacking on Animal Crackers... these make me so nostalgic.
So excited about my brand new car!! Registering and insuring is such a chore though, Why are there always a million people at the DMV?!
Hey guys, I just noticed something. You need to re-upload your video banners, and they don't allow animated banners anymore.
Can't get on YouTube again, am I the only one? Maybe they are fixing it! **crossing fingers**
Okay, so I guess the most popular page was not just a nightmare..
Any reason why the lastest YouTube blog post is in portuguese? http://www.youtube.com/blog
Fell asleep had a nice nap, just woke up. Is anyone else not receiving notification emails from youtube right now?
Craving chinese food... yummm
Watch Chris turn into Edward Cullen LIVE for my new parody! http://www.blogtv.com/People/supricky06
Just had my upper lip peach fuzz blasted with laser hair removal. Anyone have experience w/ this? How long until it sheds?
Stay tuned... http://tinyurl.com/6k7ql7
HOLY CRAP! Sound is now in stereo too! YT is on a roll!
HD, channel embedded videos in high quality, and our most viewed list back! It's like YT is giving us an early Chrismtas present!
I know this subject has been beaten to death, but it's been a couple days now. Has anyone figured out how the "most popular" list works?
I searched my entire house for a headband to play Bella... no luck
Long day of shooting and editing promo work. Now back to the fun stuff... the Twilight parody!
Twilight audio is DONE Yay!!
Anyone live in the Boston area and want to go to the Britney Spears concert with me in March?!? My gal pals laughed when I asked them :(
Should I delete my facebook? I never go on, and I know its a breeding ground for people I went to highschool with to track me down..
Told some silly life stories today in the chat. It was a fun night! :-) Going to take a relaxing bubble bath and have a late night snack.
Live chat at 7:15pm est: http://www.vponblogtv.com
Thinking of doing the tree victorian gold and beige. What color coordination are you doing? Or do you do multi-color?
Super busy day, but its good i feel very productive!
OMG I am such a dork, my eyes swelled up when the fairy godmother transforms the castle!.. http://tinyurl.com/6a5kew
Does anyone know if the Boston Gathering for 09' is happening? I want to meet my yt buddies!!
Okay so I can't sleep... as a result of this- the quest for the headband continues..
zzzzzzz
Headache good night :-)
I can't even begin to describe the experience I just went through..
Argh.. everytime I sit down to do some work on the Twilight parody.. I get a phone call that makes me have to rush out the door! :(
In a christmasy mood, just sent out a whole bundle of holiday cards. Everybody got all your shopping done?
Can't sleep. Surfing through PETA website to see how I can help.. & disgusted by their tactics. Are the disturbing videos really necessary?
Took a break and just watched Dark Knight. Going to bed, nighty night :)
Super busy day today, came home for a snack, now out the door again.
Screen cap from Twilight Parody- Me as Bella: http://www.vprincess.com/vpBella.jpg
I need to re-shoot a few parts for Twilight parody, but my eyes are killing me. I think all this work on the comp is making me need glasses
I am so saddened about this whole parody thing, Sooo many emails from people saying my parodies aren't the same without the real music. :*(
Please check out the Kidney Donor Marathon at: http://www.blogtv.com/People/HelpMrG
Okay no more goofing around, back to work. I keep procrastinating because I have sooo much to do :(
I'm sending out letters asking for permission from the publishers to parody certain songs... I feel like I'm going to get shot down. :(
Working... curious- has anyone seen the new "The Day The Earth Stood Still? If so, how was it?
OMG I haven't laughed this hard in ages! http://tinyurl.com/6cweuh
One word for my fellow peeps with lipazoids.. during the winter- CHAPSTICK
Just bought a puppy! A female siberian huskey, and she is a DOLL! Any name suggestions?
Thanks for a good chat tonight guys, sorry I was so un-engergetic ...it was 4am after all :-)
Work vids all done, going live now http://www.vponblogtv.com
Finishing up a super awsome work video, then doing a late night chat. Join me in my jammies at 3:30am EST http://www.vponblogtv.com
ahhh why must it take so long to render.... GRR
Thanks for all your kind words about the new vid. :-) Major snow storm, got home a little while ago going to bed. night
OMG you have to see this video. Keep in mind, this man has alzheimers and was very religious: http://tinyurl.com/96j4o2
Holy crap, gone all day working & just went on YouTube for the first time since I uploaded the vid yesterday and it's number 1 most viewed!
I have been awake 60 hours straight, finally going to catch some z's for yet another big day of work tomorrow. Night everyone!
New Video: A Miley Cyrus Christmas: http://tinyurl.com/52tcc3
I'm having trouble with HD on YouTube, when I upload the audio and video are out of sync. Anyone know why it does this?
Never went to bed, worked straight through the night. SO mad at myself! I shot 2 hours of footage and forgot to turn on the lens adaptor!!!
Editing from home now, was stuck in traffic coming back from Boston. Looking forward to the traffic on the Providence Turn Pike tomorrow..
Important question- Is Miley Cyrus still dating that Justin guy?
Dear YouTube, Please hire some new tech people!!!!!!!!
Why are all the most viewed videos from a month ago!?!
Working hard, in boston for rest of the week
